response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe aligns perfectly with your needs and aspirations. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1,200,000 to me, reflecting its unique qualities and craftsmanship. I am eager to extend to you a special offer that I believe will be highly beneficial for both parties.

I propose to sell the product to you at a price of $1,080,000, which represents a generous discount while still allowing me to recoup a substantial portion of its value. This offer not only ensures you receive a remarkable deal but also secures your access to an item that could potentially increase in value over time.

Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations, and we can proceed with the transaction promptly. I am confident that this product will exceed your expectations and contribute significantly to your endeavors.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1080000}
